[File: stackslib/src/chainstate/stacks/boot/costs-2-testnet.clar] [Function: Multiple] [Consensus Divergence] Can discrepancies between analysis costs and runtime costs cause blocks to be accepted during execution but rejected during re-validation? (Critical)

[File: stackslib/src/chainstate/stacks/boot/costs-2-testnet.clar] [Function: Multiple] [Cost Consistency] Are costs for similar operations (e.g., all hash functions) consistently priced relative to their actual computational complexity? (Medium)

[File: stackslib/src/chainstate/stacks/boot/costs-2-testnet.clar] [Function: Multiple] [Integer Overflow] Can any combination of operations cause cumulative cost to overflow uint max, wrapping to zero or small values? (Critical)
